title: Scroll of redirection

properties.name: description
properties.value: Scrolls of redirection are a reward from the Nightmare Zone, costing 775 reward points per scroll. Based on the expected value of spending Nightmare Zone points on herb boxes, they have a value of 883 coins. Each scroll redirects a single Teleport to house tablet to one of the following locations, provided that the player has the Construction level to have their house moved there: Rimmington, Taverley (level 10), Pollnivneach (level 20), Hosidius (level 25), Rellekka (level 30), Brimhaven (level 40), Yanille (level 50), Trollheim (requires completion of Eadgar's Ruse), and Prifddinas (requires completion of Song of the Elves).

Item ID11740

Scrolls of redirection are a reward from the Nightmare Zone, costing 775 reward points per scroll. Based on the expected value of spending Nightmare Zone points on herb boxes, they have a value of 883 coins. Each scroll redirects a single Teleport to house tablet to one of the following locations, provided that the player has the Construction level to have their house moved there: Rimmington, Taverley (level 10), Pollnivneach (level 20), Hosidius (level 25), Rellekka (level 30), Brimhaven (level 40), Yanille (level 50), Trollheim (requires completion of Eadgar's Ruse), and Prifddinas (requires completion of Song of the Elves).

If the player redirects a tablet and wishes to revert it back to its original form, the player will not get their scroll back; however, an unused scroll can be refunded without loss of points.

Players can save an inventory space when going to the God Wars Dungeon by redirecting two tablets to Trollheim, teleporting, and reverting the other back to a house tablet instead of carrying multiple teleports.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 February 2017
(update | poll)

The scroll of redirection was given a graphical update to appear more distinct from a clue scroll.

19 May 2016
(update | poll)

Ironmen can now purchase scrolls of redirection.

3 March 2016
(update)

The "Read" option was removed.

7 November 2013
(update)
  • Quest and Construction level checks were added to the teleport tablets from Nightmare Zone to not allow the player to teleport to any POH portal or Trollheim without the required level/completion.
  • The "Refund" option was added, allowing players to refund unused scrolls.

Based on the expected value of spending [[Nightmare Zone points]] on [[Herb box|herb boxes]], they have a value of {{NoCoins|(775 * (10 * ({{GEP|Grimy guam leaf|32/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy marrentill|24/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy tarromin|18/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy harralander|14/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy ranarr weed|11/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy irit leaf|8/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy avantoe|6/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy kwuarm|5/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy cadantine|4/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy lantadyme|3/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy dwarf weed|3/128}}) / 9500)) round 0|c}}. Each scroll redirects a single [[Teleport to house (tablet)|Teleport to house tablet]] to one of the following locations, provided that the player has the [[Construction]] level to have their house moved there: [[Rimmington]], [[Taverley]] (level 10), [[Pollnivneach]] (level 20), [[Hosidius]] (level 25), [[Rellekka]] (level 30), [[Brimhaven]] (level 40), [[Yanille]] (level 50), [[Trollheim]] (requires completion of [[Eadgar's Ruse]]), and [[Prifddinas]] (requires completion of [[Song of the Elves]]). If the player redirects a tablet and wishes to revert it back to its original form, the player '''will not''' get their scroll back; however, an unused scroll can be refunded without loss of points. Players can save an inventory space when going to the [[God Wars Dungeon]] by redirecting two tablets to Trollheim, teleporting, and reverting the other back to a house tablet instead of carrying multiple teleports. ==Products== {{Uses material list|Scroll of redirection}} ==Shop locations== {{Store locations list}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 9 February 2017 |update = Colourful Golems & Graphical Improvements |poll = Old School Content Poll 50: Models, Anims and More |change = The scroll of redirection was given a [[graphical updates|graphical update]] to appear more distinct from a clue scroll. }} {{Subject changes |date = 19 May 2016 |update = Sand Crabs & Soul Bearers |poll = Old School Content Poll 43: Great Kourend Content |change = [[Ironman|Ironmen]] can now purchase scrolls of redirection. }} {{Subject changes |date = 3 March 2016 |update = Architectural Alliance |change = The "Read" option was removed. }} {{Subject changes |date = 7 November 2013 |update = POH updates & weapon tweaks |change = *[[Quest]] and [[Construction]] level checks were added to the teleport tablets from [[Nightmare Zone]] to not allow the player to teleport to any POH portal or [[Trollheim]] without the required level/completion. *The "Refund" option was added, allowing players to refund unused scrolls. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Scroll of redirection (v1) detail.png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Scroll of redirection detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Scroll of redirection v1.png|center]] |[[File:Scroll of redirection.png|center]] |- |26 September 2013 –
